website_summaries.verdict: Good option for anyone who doesn't need a bench year-round.
pros: Add some sealant and this bench can bear most inclement conditions
Storage is plentiful thanks to its 2-tier shelf
cons: Some disassembly is required to fold it down

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It was easy set up, spacious, beautiful & did not have to pay $300.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Greco

customer_reviews.title: Adequate.
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in 30-45 mins. Seems adequate. Have to loosen fasteners prior to folding otherwise you also may find the wood cracks. Instructions suggest oiling to preserve finish / product. Paid almost $40 more than the 2017 summertime price being shown. Due to cracking of wood and extra work needed to finish the wood the lower price would make this a better value. As it is, overpaying is unfortunate and reduces the satisfaction level.
customer_reviews.author: Believer

customer_reviews.title: Folding Potting Bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is lovely. However, it's been up one week and the wood is already splintering and wood slats that make the table top had obvious chips out of them that were glued back on ( not very well). I also see the price dropped since I bought it, so I'm a little bothered by that. It is definitely sturdy enough to use as a server for a cook out and a bench for potting. If you keep it in a sheltered part of your patio or deck it should be fine. I won't know until the end of summer about the durability of it.
customer_reviews.author: ED78

customer_reviews.title: Terrific buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was quick and easy to assemble, and looks good. We did add a coat of urethane for extra water seal, but it's been in the rain and looks great! Don't know about the person who said it was so lightweight, it blew over - must have been one HECK of a wind gust! This is relatively lightweight, but it doesn't even shake in a 25-30 mph wind in our yard. It is simply the greatest Mother's Day gift ever! (well, okay, one of the greatest :D)
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Dahlberg

customer_reviews.title: Value for money, what a refreshing change!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on my deck so I can see plants outside my office window, I absolutely love it. Working at a desk all day means you should get up every hour for a couple of minutes, it's so nice to nip outside and do a bit of 'gardening'. I plan on buying another one as I've filled this one already. It's not overly heavy and I would understand anyone thinking it a little flimsy, but for the money I think it's great. Add a cheap trellis to the back and you've got an instant privacy screen too As it folds up, it will be easy to store for winter if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Britchick

customer_reviews.title: its cute but boards split easily.
customer_reviews.text: the wood has split at several of the places where the nuts and bolts are, necessitating re gluing and reinforcing. I didn't expect the wood to split so easy. Originally purchased to take camping. Have used once and already two major splits in the wood. and I didn't even have any weight on the top or bottom shelves of the bench. I may tear it apart and use as template to make a new one with more rigorous boards. disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Well built potting bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench parts arrived well packed with all parts listed in the directions. I was particularly impressed with the construction of the prefabricated shelves. They were put together with screws and not staples. The instructions were easy to follow, all bolt holes and screw holes were predrilled. I assembled the bench by myself using only a small power driver. After completion, I placed the bench in my backyard, gave it a coat of spar varnish and it looks like a nice piece of furniture. It will make potting my plants easier.
customer_reviews.author: CSTEINER

customer_reviews.title: Nice table !!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product - directions too small to see clearly - should print bigger for ease of assembly. Bigger print would also help identify markings for support screws that are not pre-drilled. Folds up great - easy to carry !!
customer_reviews.author: Donna W.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: This potting bench greatly exceeded my expectations. It took a little over an hour to assemble but would have taken less time if I had paid more attention to the locations of the pre-drilled holes. It is sitting on concrete and is very sturdy with no bending or swaying. It includes 4 "S" hooks for hanging light things on the lattice back. The only thing I would recommend is giving it a coat of exterior spar urethane, especially if it will be out in the weather. I have not tried to fold up the bench and probably will not.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DeMore

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: I am a 65 year old woman and I put this together in 2 hours with no problems except that I looked all through the box 3 times and the two 3/4 inch screws were not included. I was able to find 2 that fit perfectly among my screw collection. The bench is far more beautiful and sturdy than I expected especially for the price. I am very happy and can hardly wait to put the next 2 coats of polyurethane on so I can use it. The polyurethane enhances the lovely color of this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bench went together easily- really a 2 person job in order to turn it over to work on different sides. Sturdy construction, nice color. Arrived well packaged. We haven't used it yet as it is in storage in the garage until we get our patio power washed and the weather is dry. Folds up and stores easy and tidy. Perfect size and has multiple purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Love the cedar!
customer_reviews.text: I have really gotten into plants lately and I love this. It smells great - real cedar! My 22 year daughter put it together. Just think one step ahead of the directions. We had to redo some pieces. Like opps that was backwards. Directions are bit unclear at times. But once we started thinking about the next step it helped us build it correctly. Love the bench style and it folds. It's just a fun piece for gardeners.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble Nice and sturdy Not type cheap wood Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: ceddie56

customer_reviews.title: Great potting bench
customer_reviews.text: I really love this potting bench, so much so that after having my first one for a couple of years I recently bought another. It's rock solid, yet easily folded to put it away for the winter. There's a little work involved in assembly, but nothing hard. I sealed mine with lightly tinted wood sealer after a year or so. I think it will last forever if you do this every few years!
customer_reviews.author: Larry In Billerica

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: disappointing soft wood, hard to put together alone arrived with exactly the required number of bolts and screws but one bolt was BENT because it is foldable, PROP IT UP WHILE ASSEMBLING. IT CAN FOLD UP ON YOU. Use a power drill.
customer_reviews.author: Happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice however not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice assembled, wonder if it will last until next year. Very light weight, not sturdy, top of bench has chips and splits in it so not perfect condition. Don't think this happened as a result of shipping just got a bad piece of wood, too bad it's the top piece. When you collapse the bench screws and bolts become lose and need to be retightened. Wish I saw in person before I bought it, would buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Lazer

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous to put together
customer_reviews.text: Until my husband showed up with his power tools, I was ready to send it back. After 2.5 hours, it was finally assembled and is actually quite nice. I sprayed it with a waterproof sealer because it is very flimsy pine with some sort of smelly stain on it. Not sure how long this will last outside in a New Emgland summer.
customer_reviews.author: Elle K

customer_reviews.title: Use this as an outdoor kitchen when camping.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for camping. Folds and fits in my trailer. Makes a nice place to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: Rarejul

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was already stained when it arrived, but I added a coat of waterproofing to it since it was going to be outside. It's sturdy, I have it against the fence sitting on a bed of pea gravel. It was easy to put together and if you would want to put it inside for the winter, it folds up easily to fit through the doorway. I left mine outside all winter & it held up through six inches of snow with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: sherilyn66

customer_reviews.title: The Mrs loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Mrs Tech Guy loves it! We added a few coats of clear coat and rubberized the bottom couple of inches of the legs. Seems pretty sturdy so far. Now I have to find more space in the garage to store this over the winter :(
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the garden behind the shed. Great for potting and keeping tools during the warmer months. Fairly easy to put together and the folding aspect is great as I get to store it out of the harsh weather. I put a couple of coats of weather proofing on it, as was suggested, and it looks great and water rolls off. With care, this item should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: The bench is great for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: The bench is great for the price paid. Easy to put together but also a two person job. No rough spots and all the pieces were nicely finished. Does need a clear coat of polyurethane if you were to keep outside for any length of time otherwise it will dry out and split. But, even that said, this bench has many uses and I am glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: None of your business

customer_reviews.title: the instructions were not very clear. My granddaughter finally ...
customer_reviews.text: the instructions were not very clear. My granddaughter finally figured the instructions out. The potting bench is what I had hoped for. The 3 star rating is because of instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Functional, cute and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy, easy to assemble and just what my mother in law wanted (and loves!) to plant her pots on. This was a gift, so we put it together first and found some flowery print tools (spade, garden scissors, trowel) and colorful garden gloves and hung them on the back with the hooks provided. I also found a cute, decorative watering can and pots (from HomeGoods) to put on the shelf.....very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Crisco

customer_reviews.title: Came together nicely, size and height are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled this by myself; took about 45 minutes. Per other reviewers I took the time to read the instructions as well as referenced the photos several times, this was definitely helpful. Came together nicely, size and height are perfect, and it looks great! Marked down one star due to minor shipping damage on the lattice top; I'm using this as a potting bench so figured it just looks a little broken in. Will put a little wood glue on before I seal it, should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: justkristik

customer_reviews.title: Great gardening bench
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, sturdy gardening bench that really adds to a patio or deck. It's made of cedar and was pretty easy to assemble. I lent it to a grilfriend of mine who was having a bridal shower and she used it as a standing bar for making drinks and serving guests. It was a fantastic bar for entertaining too. Great purchase, can be spray painted but I like it so much with just the color of the natural wood that I kept it natural.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gurl

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This bench had a piece of split wood. The bench is not made of the best quality and is hard to fold. I would not recommend this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood bench.
customer_reviews.text: I like the bench. I bought a greenhouse and was looking for a prep bench to use inside. This is nice and sturdy enough for what I'll use it for. The price was great. Holes were pre-drilled and putting together was easy enough. Some drawers would be nice, but for the price and what others charge for their wooden benches, I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 2nd season using this bench
customer_reviews.text: great work surface. love that it folds away for storage in my potting shed for my super harsh MN winters. some other poster mentioned having to disassemble..not sure why. it just folds up. it came shipped with a couple minor dings~nothing a little wood glue and a clamp couldnt handle. I did treat it with the same waterproofing stuff I use on my deck, should be good for 5 years til retreat, maybe longer since its mostly out of the weather. a mainstay for my back deck for potting as well as entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: MN Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Nice folding table
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Its the perfect addition to my backyard, and will be easy to fold and store when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We use it for backyard parties as a drinks and food station. At 1/2 the price of similar products, it more than pays for itself. Plus it is easy to store over winter
customer_reviews.author: C. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-sized Potting Bench and very sturdy. I would recommend sealing the wood (which I did today). It was easy to assemble, with the help of my daughter, and the instructions were concise. In addition to using this bench for potting, I also plan to use it as a buffet at outdoor BBQs this summer.
customer_reviews.author: tbird

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Using this a "buffet" type table next to the grill on the porch - Was easy to put together and it looks great with trinkets on it. Even came with "S" hooks to hang items on the lattice part - Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: okcitmom

customer_reviews.title: Potting bench that doesnt cost more than a car payment
customer_reviews.text: Poor instructions but easy enough to install pro tip: do not go by the pictures they are backwards
customer_reviews.author: ToxicTiger

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have an area to work for my garden and potted plants. It makes a great work table and the shelving on the bottom is sturdy enough to hold large bags of soil.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Of course it comes knocked down, but I was able assemble it on my own with a Phillips head screwdriver.....except for the last step, where I needed n extra set of hands to hold up the trellis back while I set the screws. I love the extra work and storage space. Just wish there was a cover for it for winter storage.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Emblidge

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench
customer_reviews.text: Fits well into my outdoor scheme. Arrived well packed. Boards are straight. Easy to assemble though had to really look closely at the pictures to assemble. I water sealed the pieces prior to assembly. It is a little flimsy which is to be expected for something that folds. It's about 30 lbs and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Charming and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is quite sturdy and attractive all by itself but adorned with plants and pottery, it becomes a feature in the yard or on the patio. We just folded it up when we moved so it's one favorite thing that didn't have to be left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth, C

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Fairly sturdy for back porch use. I wouldn't want to leave it out in the weather. Easy to assemble. Better with two people. Folds up nicely. Makes a nice buffet for the back porch. Buy enough S-hooks for hanging things on the back. Just the right height.
customer_reviews.author: Perki Winkle

customer_reviews.title: This is the best purchase I ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I ever made. Just the right height to plant. No more backaches. We did brush a marine spare vanish for weather. Have it on patio and you would never know it was a planter bench . I'd recommend to everyone. Love the way it folds up for storage
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: It is a good height for working with plants
customer_reviews.text: My foldable potting bench met al my expectations. It is a good height for working with plants. I haven't had a chance to use it as a serving counter for parties but expect it to do well. It was not difficult to assemble. I can fold it and unfold it by myself, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Potting Bench.
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to put together. Just follow the directions. Nice strong construction. I like the design and enjoy using it.'
customer_reviews.author: Alazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great potting table
customer_reviews.text: Great potting table. Easy to put together.Took me about 45 minutes with just a screw driver. Today I stained it to help weather outside conditions. Looks better in-person then on computer- which is unusual. Very solid and a good price too . Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: We love this bench
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench.. but not so easy to put together as suggested, and it is a bit awkward and heavy to move around, Looks really great on my condo terrace and does hold up in the wind. We did secure it to the decking rails to insure it would stay in place . A coat of clear stain keeps it looking good and wear better. We haven't take taken apart yet for winter storage, but we like this feature. Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight potting bench.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, lightweight potting bench. It was very easy to assemble. The instructions were clear and easy to follow. Best of all the bench folds completely flat and because of it's light weight it can be hung on a wall for storage. I'm very happy with this potting bench. It is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen F

customer_reviews.title: My new workbench for me and my plants
customer_reviews.text: I love my new workbench which I purchased at Amazon.com. This table will make it so much easier to transplant my plants and take care of my garden. It is well made and was easy to put together. Besides the wood really smells good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Huffy

customer_reviews.title: Great On our Deck
customer_reviews.text: I had wanted something to use as a sideboard on our deck for entertaining. This was easy to assemble and folds flat for indoor storage in our garage during the winter. We used deck stain on it for protection and after two years, it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica S. Boll

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Just make sure to read all of the instructions first. Some of the peices are difficult to tell which way to put on by just the drawing... Other than that... PERFECT. Oh and its pretty big, not a small crappy potting bench by any means...
customer_reviews.author: Tara B

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This bench was affordable, easy to put together, and fit just right in my space. I spent a weekend finishing and sealing it and the results have been great. It feels sturdy and folds easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Pots off the ground.
customer_reviews.text: Item delivered, no damage, and is in use already, good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Valkyrie16

customer_reviews.title: Iam happy with thought
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, it's not heavy duty and is made of soft wood. The price was right I could not see spending alot of money on something that was only going to be use occasionally. Iam happy with thought.
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a heavy duty bench but well worth the money you pay for a light/ medium duty bench. had my husband varnish it before assembling, made it look terrific and will keep it looking nicer longer. He also installed wheels on it so now when I work on it, I roll it outside. When I am done, I clean it and roll it back into my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Meeske

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Solid, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality item--all wood. It also smells nice (cedar). The one sort of complaint is that it is not entirely easy to put together. I attached the legs wrong and had to undo and redo. But once I managed to assemble, I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Went together fairly easy. Looks great and so many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I have limited space in my potting shed so I love that I can fold it away when not using it. I also use it as an outdoor buffet at cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: cheryllleee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They said it took two people but I did it myself - easy! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Good and functional
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together but you do need two people to put the top surface together. Handsome. A few holes didn't quite align but they worked. I put on a varnish sealer and hold it will last a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Great product....
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I ordered and I love them both. Easy to assemble, stands up to the weather and elements well, and is very functional. Great seller and packaging and instructions. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Arte

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Only had it up for a short time. So far so good. Would suggest putting a couple coats of oil base sealer on it before using.
customer_reviews.author: Quail watcher

customer_reviews.title: Bought this over a year ago and it still looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and still looks like it did the first day after sitting outside for over a year. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what it was made for, and folds up..what is not to love
customer_reviews.text: This is OK, pretty easy for one person to put together. Not the highest quality wood and you will need to put a protective coat on this.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Diva

customer_reviews.title: love this bench
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench. Hubs varnished it for me and the color looks beautiful. Perfect height and lots of room on lattice to hang tools.
customer_reviews.author: Philly J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I finished all the wood with 3 coats of spar urethane before I put it together, and I am tickled to death with the way it turned out! The bottom shelf holds a lot, because it is 20 " deep. I bought more s-hooks to hold tools and stuff, and my lanai looks a lot neater! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Practical and a real bargain.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these, two for me and one as a gift for my son. It looks good, can be used as an outdoor buffet as well as a potting bench, and is easy to assemble. At this price, it is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: sc prof

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I got one for myself ad another as a gift......LOVE IT!!!!!! One of the best things..it folds flat. Easy to fold and store in the potting shed for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: wendy Comar

customer_reviews.title: Customers were very satisfied as long as they are happy & pleased I ...
customer_reviews.text: Customers were very satisfied as long as they are happy & pleased I am also very pleased and confident in the product .
customer_reviews.author: Joe Lengyel

customer_reviews.title: It is so great! received it fast and was easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I reallylove the folding potting bench. It is so great! received it fast and was easy to put together. Now I can repot my plants and enjoy it even more. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed- the wood is already cracking and I've only had it since May... we are outside the return window but I would return it if I could ... so sad because I really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Susan Yamate

customer_reviews.title: I very much like the bench
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the bench. The only thing that was difficult was seeing and understanding the assembly instructions. The illustrations were very small and weren't that clear. I'd recommend enlarging the pictures and type.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Kratochvil

customer_reviews.title: but the directions aren't the best for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but the directions aren't the best for assembly. Lightweight. I sealed mine before I put it outside, it's held up well all summer.
customer_reviews.author: EFMT

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: Took a little time and four hands to get this set up, but once done it is just as described. It has made a nice accent for my gardening area as well as being very practical. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a garden decor or a workable potting bench.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Diva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price, we are using it as a buffet for parties.
customer_reviews.author: August Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Attractive Potting Bench
customer_reviews.text: I am using this under an eave and against my house outdoors. It's become a combination potting table and grill station. I added additional cup hooks to one side of it to hang my grilling tools, while on the hooks provided, I hang garden tools. I sprayed it with Thompson's Weather Seal, and it's doing great in the rain and sun. You will want to use the "optional" back braces. The piece is tall and can use the support. I don't think it's particularly hard to put together, but the line drawings aren't especially easy to read. Comparison shop for this item as prices are all over the place. At the time I purchased, Amazon was the best place....
customer_reviews.author: miamimom

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrive not damaged packed very well using this as a bar on my patio. This is a awesome product. If you are going to paint the bench paint it before you assemble.
customer_reviews.author: gami

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a nice looking bench
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a nice looking bench. Assembly was easy, less than 30 minutes. I put a coat of sealer on it before it went outside and it lools great.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Am planning to use it as a BBQ work area/accessory. Just finished putting it together. It was a cinch. Pieces fit together perfectly. Great instructions. Very well made, thoughtfully designed - love the fact that it folds up. Have been looking for just the right thing for a long time and this more than meets my expectations. What a bargain! It is available elsewhere for a little to a lot more, plus sometimes ridiculous shipping costs. Wonderful to get it with free, quick shipping, no tax. Amazon is the best!
customer_reviews.author: mariooshi

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench and would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, great looking and portable. Can easily take down for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Geneadelle

customer_reviews.title: perfect work bench
customer_reviews.text: i use this as a lightweight work bench. prefect for my needs since i don't need to place anything on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I had bought something online of this size and type. I was a bit nervous, but the other reviews gave me courage. ha. It's a great size and folds easily. Putting it together went just fine. My only comment....if it is to be left outside, then a sealer is definitely a must. I doubt this product will last for years and years, but for the money it is a good bet and I am not a big spender.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Everything I thought it would be. It is sturdy, nice looking and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much we use it for a plant stand on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Funke

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Major part missing. Crossbar for the back, that stabilizes the bench and other parts attach to is MISSING
customer_reviews.author: Dawn J Mahoney CPLP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great potting table, plenty of room to work, space leftover. Good storage also, especially on the bottom. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: bevybev

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new pottery bench! A perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Karyn M. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great on the patio where I do my planting
customer_reviews.author: Travel Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a knee and back saver! Love the fact it folds for storage. Have thoroughly enjoyed this product! Perfect for working with my potted plants.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaminsky

customer_reviews.title: Great potting bench!
customer_reviews.text: I love my potting bench! Writing this over a year after receiving. :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The size was great, easy to put together, light weight, and perfect for potting on our deck. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: KDmchugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to build and it ended up looking nice once put together. Looks also reasonably sturdy for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Tombesi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice -  some quality issues but for the price its a yes
customer_reviews.text: Love the free shipping Went together easy - with the exception of the hanging tool bar Very attractive and folds easily had to fix a couple of stripped screws.
customer_reviews.author: Almostover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and so easy to put together. Very sturdy. I did protect it with Thompson's water seal. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Farmer-Phelps

customer_reviews.title: The Ideal Potting Bench
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a potting bench but worried about what to do with it during off season. This bench takes care of that concern. It is very well made, and folds easily for storage when not in use. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ksvj

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Easy to put together. Got there on time. Not a potting bench for the professional, but a good one for a novice like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: This was a great find for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find for me. Easy to put together, and folds easily. I used it on my deck all summer to keep my flower and vegetable pots displayed, and as a potting bench. Loved the look. Needs a lot of weather proofing though. Will need to put extra layers on it next year as 2 spray coats still did not keep some of the rain from soaking in. At the end of summer I folded it and am storing it in the garage. Light enough for me to move it by myself. I also will Wd-40 the hinges as after summer they did not move as easily as I thought they would. Still a great find.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Always get compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together. Looks great. Always get compliments on it!! extremely happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Love my cats

customer_reviews.title: ... Thompsons water seal then assembled it and it is perfect for my back patio
customer_reviews.text: Sealed it with Thompsons water seal then assembled it and it is perfect for my back patio!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Carnes

customer_reviews.title: Nice but confusing
customer_reviews.text: The table is what I expected. However the assembly instructions where poorly written. I had to take it apart twice before getting it right and then only by pulling up the photos on line and enlarging them for help. Still not sure if it is right, but it seems ok.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Bonsteel

customer_reviews.title: Foldable Potting bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench was a bit tricky to put together, but when I finally got it toether--I was delighted! It is a real value and looks great on my patio
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: with bad back, i was still able to assemble this bench on my own. i love it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Z. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: A must for potting plants
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed by the quality of this item. Sturdy & durable. My husband coated it with a sealer and its perfect. I received it very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The entire unit collapsed, dont' buy this under any circumstances...
customer_reviews.author: M

product_meta.title: Foldable Potting Bench
feature_bullets: Features two tiers of ample shelf space and hanging bar accessory for hanging tools.
May be used as Potting Bench in your garden, outdoor buffet table on your deck or patio, or for additional storage and counter space in your garage.
Fold up flat for easy storage during the off seasons.
Wood is Kiln Dried and Treated with Natural Color Stain to Enhance the Appearance and Durability of the Furniture.
Easy To Assemble, Easy to Follow Assembly Instructions and Hardware Included. Phillips Screwdriver Required.
